name: KeepShopkeeping 2
description:
KeepShopkeeping 2 is a game about learning new recipes and crafting them. In the game you will be able to meet the lovely townies of Keepshopkeeping 2 and battle new monsters, defeat new bosses and ultimately defeat the Final Boss...., This game contains new recipes, new unique story, unique weapons and armors to be crafted, fishing. and a tons of other unique features bound to KeepShopkeeping 2.FEATURES
  • Singleplayer
  • Charismatic Main Character
  • Buy and Sell armor, weapons.
  • Craft unique weapons and armor.
  • Unique Lore to be explored.
  • Fishing
  • Visit the Shop, The Market, The Bazar.
  • Upgrade your Shop everytime.
  • Discover new and powerful Recipes.

Eiteran

His main ambition is to be the richest man in the whole world!

Hidan

Friend of Eiteran whom will be helping him in his adventure by selling him powerful merchandise!
